Title: Institutional Pandemic Preparedness Assessment
Description: University, transport, retail, and media preparedness gaps identified pre-COVID arrival
Community_Context: University campus, public transport systems, retail environments
Decision_Points: Recognition of systematic preparedness gaps; Identification of intervention opportunities; Assessment of cross-sector coordination needs

Title: Masks4All NZ Community Intervention Development
Description: Grassroots community organization emergence with academic-activist collaboration
Decision_Points: Formation of collaborative intervention framework; Integration of academic and community perspectives; Development of multi-channel communication strategy

Title: Māori and Pacific Islander Community Crisis Response
Description: Targeted interventions for disproportionately affected communities in South Auckland
Community_Context: Māori and Pacific Islander communities, South Auckland region
Decision_Points: Recognition of disproportionate community impact; Development of culturally responsive interventions; Establishment of trusted community partnerships

Title: Hyperlocal Hand Sanitizer Production Initiative
Description: Community-led production to address supply chain disruptions
Community_Context: Local production networks, WHO guideline compliance
Decision_Points: Recognition of supply chain void identification; Local production capacity assessment; Quality assurance protocol establishment
